name: demnet
description: ## Abstract I want to introduce a system, that ensures that all voter's choice is secret and that everybody can check the tally, without knowing who voted how. But to ensure the secrecy we need to have a trusted party, called the supervisor. This might be automatized by using a Smart Contract on a Blockchain, that can access IPFS. Otherwise the whole Election is decentralized   and can be validated by anyone who wants to.
author: Joris Gutjahr & Abbashan
